ygData.subject: Re: PoA bard quests plus a rant
ygData.msgSnippet: I think mage pets each get one of the four that they can buy each rank not positive though. Anyway at level 50 if you don t have a haste sash as a warrior then
ygData.messageBody:
I think mage pets each get one of the four that they can buy each rank not
positive though. Anyway at level 50 if you don't have a haste sash as a
warrior then your behind in the equip you should have.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... <kim@...>
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com' <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, January 28, 2000 3:48 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] PoA bard quests plus a rant


>From: <kim@...>
>
>On Fri, 28 Jan 2000, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:
>>
>> Don't believe the warrior can get a Haste spell as easily as one could
come
>> by two fine steel daggers. Or summoned mage daggers for that matter.
Its
>> way easier to boost the pet by giving it daggers because the weapon only
>> affects the speed of the npc, not the damage caused.
>
>Yes, FS daggers are easy to get. But getting the items so you
>can research the pet spell so that you even have a pet to give
>the daggers to is roughly as difficult as getting a haste
>item. AFAIK, except for the enchanter pets, none of the pet
>spells past about level 25 can be bought.
>
>--
>John H. Kim
